Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Nagle/Hyacinth St
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Nagle/Hyacinth St.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Nagle/Hyacinth St.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at 79th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at 79th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
